#summary deltadays - calculates the number of days in a range

= Usage =

`deltadays <options> [start] [end]`



= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-s||--start||<start> ||start date of range||
||-e||--end||<end> ||end date of range||
||-f||--format||<format> ||date format to use (default: YYYY-MM-DD)||
